statement.p: Amanda rented a bike from Ted's Bikes.
It costs 11 for the helmet plus 2.25 per hour.
If Amanda paid about 27.88, how many hours did she rent the bike?
a) Let \displaystyle{h} = the number of hours she rented the bike. Write the equation you would use to solve this problem.
Amanda rented the bike for hours. (Round your answer to the nearest tenth of an hour.)
